Verses: 1 thamaskuvin Baaram. Idho, Thamaskuvaanadhu Nagaramaayiraamal Thallappattu, Paazhaana Manmedaagum.
2 aaroverin Pattanangal Paazhaai Vidappattu, Mandhaigalin Veliyaayirukkum; Mirattuvaarillaamal Avaigal Ange Paduththukkollum.

3 aran Eppiraayeemaiyum, Raajaangam Thamaskuvaiyum Vittozhiyum; Isravel Puththirarudaiya Magimaikkunerittadhupola Seeriyaavil Meedhiyaayiruppavargalukkum Neridum Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
4 akkaalaththile Yaakkobin Magimai Kuraindhupom, Avanudaiya Kozhuththa Thegam Melindhupom.
5 oruvan Ongina Payirai Arindhu, Than Kaiyinaal Kadhirgalai Aruththu, Reppaayeem Pallaththaakkile Kadhirgalai Serkkiradhupolirukkum.

6 aanaalum Olivamaraththai Ulukkumpodhu Nunikkombile Irandumoondru Kaaigalum Kaaikkira Adhin Kilaigalile Naalaindhu Kaaigalum Meedhiyaayiruppadhupola, Adhile Pinparippukkuk Konjam Meedhiyaayirukkumendru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiraar.
7 akkaalaththile Manushan Than Kaigalin Kiriyaiyaagiya Peedangalai Nokkaamalum, Than Viralgal Undupannina Thoppuvikkiragangalaiyum, Silaigalaiyum Nokkaamalum,
8 thannai Undaakkinavaraiye Nokkuvaan, Avan Kangal Isravelin Parisuththaraiye Nokkikkondirukkum.
9 akkaalaththile Avargaludaiya Aranaana Pattanangal Isravel Puththirarukku Meedhiyaai Vaikkappatta Thazhaiyaippolavum, Nunikkombaippolavumaagi, Paazhaaik Kidakkum.
10 un Belamaagiya Kanmalaiyai Nee Ninaiyaamal, Un Ratchippaagiya Dhevanai Marandhaai; Aadhalaal Nee Nerththiyaana Naatrugalai Nattaalum, Anniya Dhesaththuk Kandrugalai Vaiththaalum,
11 pagarkaalaththile Un Naatrai Valaravum, Vidiyarkaalaththile Un Vidhaiyai Mulaikkavum Panninaalum, Palanai Serkkum Naalile Dhukkamum Kadumvedhanaiyume Ungal Aruppaayirukkum.
12 aiyo! Kadalgal Kondhalikkiradhupola Kondhalikkira Anega Janangalin Thiralum, Balaththa Thanneergal Iraigiradhupola Iraigira Janakkoottangalin Amaliyum Undaayirukkiradhu.

13 janakkoottangal Thiralaana Thanneergal Iraigiradhupola Iraindhaalum, Avargalai Avar Adhattuvaar; Avargal Dhooramaai Odippovaargal; Malaigalile Kaatrinaal Parakkadikkira Padharaippolavum, Suzhalkaatrile Adappatta Thurumbaippolavum Thuraththappaduvaargal.
14 idho, Saayankaalaththile Kalakkamundaagum, Vidiyarkaalaththukkumun Avargal Ozhindhupovaargal; Idhuve Nammaik Kollaiyaadugiravargalin Pangum, Nammai Sooraiyaadugiravargalin Veedhamumaayirukkum.
